comments.text:
A great hamburger should have 80% of meat and 20% of fat. That's the best :)

PS. Wrong typing.  >> If your beef is already fatty, you don't need to add 
pig fat.
comments.author: Sangdad Publishing

comments.text:
It was pig fat. If your pork is already fatty, you don't need it. Hope this 
help. ;-)
comments.author: Sangdad Publishing

captions.text: Today we're going to make homemade cheeseburger.
It is very easy to cook
We're using ready-made minced meat which is commonly available.
But if you want to use imported meat, you can buy and have it minced at the shop.
The recipe will slightly be different as ready-made minced meat has less fat than the imported meat.
I add pork fat to make up for it.
I also use onion to add savory flavor to the meat.
Chop it finely
until you won't feel its texture when eating.
As for the pork fat, slice it into small pieces before chopping finely.
Otherwise, it will be too difficult to chop.
The ideal hamburger has meat
and fat in the proportion 8:2.
When the fat is finely chopped, add to the minced meat,
followed with 1 egg yolk.
The egg yolk acts as a glue to connect all the ingredients together.
It's time to knead them.
The egg yolk also adds the fat and richness to the meat.
Knead, knead and knead.
Then shape the mixture into round balls.
Slap with your hand to form patties.
Use your fingers to press them into flat round shapes.
Leave the patties in the refrigerator to maintain the shape for 15 minutes.
Cheeseburger, I think, is a comfort food for many people,
including me.
Normally we go out and eat it at a fast food restaurant.
But I think the homemade version is better.
Spread the butter.
It's time to roast the bread.
When the pan is hot, place the bread rolls face-down on the grill pan.
Use high heat to brown the outside. This way we leave the inside soft.
Ah, great color!
Turn off the heat.
Set aside.
Heat the olive oil in a skillet. Place the meat patties.
Cook until the bottom sides are done and looking great.
Flip.
They smell good.
Wait a little longer until done.
Then top each patty with a slice of cheese.
Cook the patties the right way, they will not be tough.
The inside must still be juicy.
Be careful not to overcook it. Otherwise the juice inside will be gone.
When everything is done, let's form them into burgers.
Add the seasoning sauces: ketchup, mayonnaise and mustard, as you please.
Place the onion
and pickled cucumber.
Cheeseburgers are suitable for eating together:
eating with your family or with your friends who come over.
You cook and share them with everyone.
When your friend take a  big bite out of the burger
and the sauce and juice spread all over his mouth and cheeks,
I think that's it. That's the fun of eating cheeseburgers.
Homemade cheeseburgers. Delightful bites.
I can do it, and you can do it too. COOK IT YOURSELF!

title: CIY 010 : โฮมเมด ชีสเบอร์เกอร์ (Homemade Cheeseburger)
